thread.title: Barrow invites all to his inauguration as president of The Gambia
thread.title_full: Barrow invites all to his inauguration as president of The Gambia

author: Zovoe Jonathan
title: Barrow invites all to his inauguration as president of The Gambia

organizations.name: economic community of west african states

text:
Tweet 
The President-elect of The Gambia has invited all to his inauguration as the President of of the country. 
Barrow said this in a tweet on Thursday that the inauguration would be holding at the Gambian embassy in Dakar, the Senegalese capital. 
Barrow had fled in the week to Senegal after Yahya Jammeh who lost at the December 1 presidential election to him has refused to leave office despite international pressure and a threat by leaders of the Economic Community of West African States, or ECOWAS, to enforce his election defeat. 
The inauguration is holding today at 4pm at The Gambian embassy in senegal. You are all welcome to my inauguration today 4pm at The #Gambian embassy in #Dakar . 
— Adama Barrow (@BarrowOfficial1) January 19, 2017 Adama Barrow tweets his inauguration as President of The Gambia will take place on Gambian territory in Senegal. #JoySMS pic.twitter.com/zjxp0R169J
